verses.verse: And David<WH1732> assembled<WH6950> all the princes<WH8269> of Israel<WH3478>, the princes<WH8269> of the tribes<WH7626>, and the captains<WH8269> of the companies<WH4256> that ministered<WH8334> to the king<WH4428> by course<WH4256>, and the captains<WH8269> over the thousands<WH505>, and captains<WH8269> over the hundreds<WH3967>, and the stewards<WH8269> over all the substance<WH7399> and possession<WH4735> of the king<WH4428>, and of his sons<WH1121>, with the officers<WH5631>, and with the mighty men<WH1368>, and with all the valiant men<WH2428>, unto Jerusalem<WH3389>.

¶ And thou, Solomon<WH8010> my son<WH1121>, know<WH3045> thou the God<WH430> of thy father<WH1>, and serve<WH5647> him with a perfect<WH8003> heart<WH3820> and with a willing<WH2655> mind<WH5315>: for the LORD<WH3068> searcheth<WH1875> all hearts<WH3824>, and understandeth<WH995> all the imaginations<WH3336> of the thoughts<WH4284>: if thou seek<WH1875> him, he will be found<WH4672> of thee; but if thou forsake<WH5800> him, he will cast thee off<WH2186> for ever<WH5703>.

¶ Then David<WH1732> gave<WH5414> to Solomon<WH8010> his son<WH1121> the pattern<WH8403> of the porch<WH197>, and of the houses<WH1004> thereof, and of the treasuries<WH1597> thereof, and of the upper chambers<WH5944> thereof, and of the inner<WH6442> parlours<WH2315> thereof, and of the place<WH1004> of the mercy seat<WH3727>,
